keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support the Government's long-term economic plan to restore our finances, jobs and growth.
Oppose the plan to build an offshore wind farm that would endanger our tourist industry.
Working for more effective legislation to limit traveller intrusions into our parks.
Standing up for local residents whose lives are blighted by party houses.
Believe in standing up for Britain, law and order, and a firm policy on immigration.
Continue to support an in/out referendum on the EU - let the people decide.

issues.brexitEurope: Continue to support an in/out referendum on the EU - let the people decide.
issues.economy: Support the Government's long-term economic plan to restore our finances, jobs and growth.
issues.environment: Oppose the plan to build an offshore wind farm that would endanger our tourist industry.
issues.immigration: Believe in standing up for Britain, law and order, and a firm policy on immigration.

housing.content: Standing up for local residents whose lives are blighted by party houses.

images.caption: Robert Syms, Conservative Candidate for Poole
